name: Dinner Tonight: Chile Colorado
description: I’ve been dreaming about enchiladas recently. I’m not sure where the hankering came from, but it certainly wasn’t helped after I had some spectacularly bad ones at a local Tex-Mex outlet. I decided to tackle them myself. There is no...

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil over medium in a sauce pan. Whisk in the flour, until it has darkened slightly, about 1 minute.
Add the red chile powder and garlic, stir until combined and then let cook for 1 minute.
Pour in the water slowly, whisking constantly to avoid lumps.
Season with salt, simmer the sauce on low for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
